page.description: A step-by-step guild to testing an Alpha Anywhere mobile or web applictaion using Live Preview.

description.p: When you Live Preview a Component, the Component is published to a special directory called "Live Preview" in the web root.

The first time a Component is previewed, a *[ui:Full Preview]* must be performed. *[ui:Full Preview]* publisheds all of the CSS styles, Javascript files, images, child Components, and other resources referenced by the Component to the "Live Preview" directory. If there are a large number of resources, publishing can take a few moments.

Once files have been initially published, the publishing step can be skipped using *[ui:Fast Preview]*. When a *[ui:Fast Preview]* is perfomed, only the Component is published to the "Live Preview" directory.
If you make changes to the Component's referenced resources, a *[ui:Full Preview]* is required so the new resources will be published to the "Live Preview" directory.
